wraEvi:
EMF Level 5 
Spirit Box 
D.O.T.S. Projector
wraTra: Wraiths will never step in a salt pile. That means it won't be affected by T3 salt during hunts!
wraAbi:
The Wraith can teleport to any player on the map and start roaming, hunting, doing interactions, or events. 
 
When the Wraith teleports, it will give you EMF 2. 
If you are walking around and suddenly have EMF 2, it might have been a Wraith teleport.

Can Hunt at 50% Sanity.
